trans-unit.source: Describes the workflow instances that are stored in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 描述儲存在工作流程執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that shows whether the workflow instance is blocked.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，顯示工作流程執行個體是否遭到封鎖。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow instance is blocked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果工作流程執行個體遭到封鎖。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time in UTC format at which the next timer will expire.
trans-unit.target: 取得下一個計時器將到期的 UTC 格式的時間。

trans-unit.source: The time in UTC format at which the next timer will expire.
trans-unit.target: 以 UTC 格式下一個計時器將到期時間。

trans-unit.source: Gets the status of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得工作流程執行個體的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Possible values are: Completed, Created, Running, Suspended, Terminated.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值為︰ Completed、 Created、 執行、 暫停、 終止。

trans-unit.source: The status of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行個體的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description for the suspension or termination of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述的暫止或終止<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The description for the suspension or termination of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 取得工作流程執行個體識別項。
工作流程執行個體識別項。
